<p><font size="3" face="Verdana">(February 12, 2012) QuTiP has received its 1000th unique visitor from Istanbul Turkey.</font><p>

<p><font size="3" face="Verdana">(February 02, 2012) Detailed instructions on how to install QuTiP under Windows may be found in the <a href="http://qutip.googlecode.com/svn/doc/HEAD/html/installation.html#installation-on-microsoft-windows">development documentation</a>.</font><p>

<p><font size="3" face="Verdana">(January 28, 2012) Updated to version 1.1.3-4 for Windows bug and non-Hermitian operator error in mcsolve.</font><p>

<p><font size="3" face="Verdana">(November 22, 2011) Small update 1.1.3 is now available.</font><p>

<p><font size="3" face="Verdana">(October 31, 2011) The new <a href="http://qutip.googlecode.com/svn/doc/1.1.3/html/index.html">QuTiP Documentation</a> is now online .</font><p>

<p><font size="3" face="Verdana">(October 27, 2011) Version 1.1.2 fixes a bug in version 1.1.1 for the monte-carlo solver.</font><p>

<p><font size="3" face="Verdana">(October 25, 2011) Version 1.1.1 includes vastly improved odesolve and mcsolve functions.</font><p>

<p><font size="3">(October 07, 2011) <font color="FF0033">DO NOT RUN QUTIP FROM THE INSTALLATION DIRECTORY</font>.  If you need futher assistance, please check out the [http://groups.google.com/group/qutip QuTiP discussion group].</font><p>

<p><font size="3">(October 05, 2011) The formal QuTiP publication has been posted online at <a href="http://arxiv.org/abs/1110.0573">arXiv:1110.0573</a>.  If you find QuTiP useful, please consider citing this publication.  This will help support further software development.</font><p>

<p><font size="3">(October 04, 2011) We have released the first point release of QuTiP.  This brings some new features to the toolbox, as well as some much needed bug fixing.  This is the version used in the forthcoming QuTiP publication.</font><p>

<p><font size="3">(July 29, 2011) After over one thousand revisions on nearly 5000 lines of code, we are happy to release the initial 1.0.0 version of QuTiP.  The files necessary for installation may be found in the downloads section.  Instructions on how to install and use QuTiP may be found in the WIKI.</font><p>
